Text:
Tip: To quickly open the Savegame directory, copy and paste the line below in the Run dialog and press Enter.

"%UserProfile%\AppData\Roaming\Rovio\Angry Birds"
i cannot seem to find a setup.lua or highscores.lua in my version? all i have is \angrybirds\data\levels   showing individual level folders.

You can find them in %UserProfile%\AppData\Roaming\Rovio\Angry Birds"
Which redirects to "C:\Users\YourUserName\AppData\Roaming\Rovio\Angry Birds"
Thanks....Can U Plz Upload CyberLink Power Recover 5?
Can you please make a video how you do that, i dont find this lua files.
PS: Where is the Run dialog

You can access the Run dialog by pressing Win+R on your keyboard or by clicking on the run button in your Start Menu.

Now copy and paste the line below in the Run dialog:

"%UserProfile%\AppData\Roaming\Rovio\Angry Birds"

Press Enter ... Tadaaaa! :)
can you do this on mac and if you can how do you do it?
